Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory183.png'}
{3: 'After accidentally becoming Qu\'s "partner" on the Nighter, she takes you to Kowloong\'s gate.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: "Now that you're my partner, understanding what's so great about Kowloong is priority number one.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'I already know them as the enemy.', 3: '7'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Really? Well, I'm sure there is a place in the city that you've never been to.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Guard', 3: "Halt! Who goes there?! You can't just come and go as you please. You need a pass to enter the city...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ignoring the guard Construct, Qu walks straight up to the city wall...'}
{3: 'This must have been unforeseen for the guard, and he does not manage to react in time to stop her.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'Accessing highest authorization—Imperial Level. Opening door...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Qu raises her hands with impressive force, but the gate does not budge an inch.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'How dare they override my authority! Open the gate!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Guard', 3: "Hey... Aren't you the commandant from Babylonia? Is she one of your squad mates? Looks like her head ain't on too tight.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Since Qu was using the Female Construct, no one can tell that she is actually the Kowloong Supreme.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'Guard! I warned you to check the security and integrity of the city wall every day!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Why hasn't this door's authorization system been fixed already?!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Guard', 3: 'It was working this morning...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Well, then how come even I can't open it now?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Guard', 3: "Well, maybe it's because Huaxu was kidnapped, so the authorization system has reset. We don't know how to fix it either... Wait, why am I telling you all of this?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'You seem to lack the proper etiquette when addressing the Kowloong Supreme. I order you on highest authority to open the city gate.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Guard', 3: 'Kowloong Supreme...? Highest authority...?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Seeing Qu divulge her true identity so carelessly, you pull her aside and proceed to deal with the guard yourself.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Guard', 3: "What's the meaning of this? Do you wish to enter Kowloong...? Are you on a mission?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yes, we wish to enter.', 3: '39'}
{2: 'Guard', 3: "Then why didn't you apply for a pass beforehand? Speak...", 4: '1'}
{2: "Because we're on an urgent mission.", 3: '41'}
{2: 'Guard', 3: 'Well, seeing as your only team member is this brain-dead Construct here, it sure must be urgent...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sorry, I hope you understand.', 3: '43'}
{3: 'The guard let out a sigh, then opens the gate.'}
{2: 'Guard', 3: "Very well... Considering your contributions made to the metropolis, I'll take your word for it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hehe, thank you.', 3: '46'}
{2: 'Guard', 3: 'But you need to register first... Hey! What makes you think you can just waltz on in!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Qu walks into the metropolis without further delay.'}
{2: "Sorry! I'll register for her!", 3: '50'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory172.png'}
{3: 'After entering the metropolis, Qu is awkwardly silent.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: "I never thought I, the Kowloong Supreme, couldn't even open a door.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "More surprisingly, I thought you, Gray Raven Commandant, were an upstanding individual. I didn't think you could lie through your teeth without batting an eye.", 4: '1'}
{2: "You can't exactly label us humans like that so easily.", 3: '57'}
{3: 'Qu could hear the sarcasm in your voice and wants to retort, but you interrupt her.'}
{2: "Helping each other out—that's what partners are for.", 3: '59'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "So that's what a partner is...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She gives you another angry look, but you can tell that she is not really that angry.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "I'm not acting like a novice. But as the Supreme, I've always detested deceiving those lesser than me.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Qu ignores you and proceeds to walk further into Kowloong...'}
